name: Faux Filler Shiny Non-Sticky Lip Gloss
about: What it is: A hydrating, non-sticky lip gloss for high-shine lips that visibly smooths and blurs fine lines...Formulation Type: Lip Gloss..Benefits: Hydrating and Moisturizing..Highlighted Ingredients: - Vegan Collagen: Smooths the look of lip lines...Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS & SLES...What Else You Need to Know: The hydrating, fine-line smoothing formula melts onto the lips with a non-stick, reflective ‘glass-like’ finish. Packed with lip-loving, active ingredients like vitamin E and infused with vegan collagen for comfortable coverage that moisturizes the lips. It comes along with a big juicy doe foot with an innovative reservoir that holds the max formula for instant glossy lips.
ingredients: -Vegan Collagen: Smooths the look of lip lines. ..Diisostearyl Malate, Polybutene, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Polyphenylsilsesquioxane, Glyceryl Behenate/Eicosadioate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Flavor/Aroma, Ethyl Vanillin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Silica, Tin Oxide, Mica, Titanium Dioxide/Ci 77891, Iron Oxides/Ci 77491.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use the tip of the gloss to line the lips and then fill in with the juicy applicator for full, glossy lips..-To add definition line with Lip Contour 2.0 (sold separately) and apply gloss as above for a lip filler effect....Huda Hacks:.-Lip cuff by applying Lip Contour 2.0 in Rich Brown in the corners of the lips..-Blend it out..-Line and define the cupid’s bow with Lip Contour 2.0 in Warm Brown..-Set with Easy Bake Loose Setting Powder (sold separately) for lips that last all day..-Apply FAUX FILLER Gloss in shade Glassy for the juiciest lip combo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The gloss is hydrating and non-sticky.  I love the subtle plumping effect it provides without feeling overly tingly or uncomfortable. It enhances the lips with a smooth, fuller look. It has a creamy, soft texture that glides on easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried this Ube lip gloss, and I'm impressed. The high-shine finish makes my lips look fuller without any stickiness. I love how it smooths out fine lines, giving a plump appearance without any tingling sensation. Ube is going to be the next IT pigment!

If you are a 90s kid who misses lip glosses and prefers them to lip oils, this is for you! I love the vanilla scent and how glossy and smooth the texture is. I also love the packaging, and there is a good amount of product in one tube!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Huda Beauty’s UBE - Faux Filler Gloss is a standout product that delivers on its promises. The shade UBE is a stunning soft lavender that adds a unique touch to any lip look. The formula is creamy and non-sticky, providing a comfortable wear that lasts for hours. I appreciate the subtle plumping effect, which gives my lips a fuller appearance without any unpleasant tingling. The gloss has a beautiful high-shine finish that leaves lips looking luscious and healthy. The packaging is sleek and travel-friendly, making it easy to carry around for touch-ups. Overall, this gloss is a fabulous addition to my makeup collection, perfect for both casual and glam occasions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m obsessed! I already own different shades of this gloss and this one is so pretty and goes well with pink brown lip combos. Doesn’t feel sticky and looks so shiny I love huda beauty products they’re my fav

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the Ube Color Faux Filler Gloss. The color isn’t too visible on my lips since I have tan skin. The gloss has a smooth texture that isn't sticky. It feels more like a lip balm than a gloss.

I absolutely love the texture and color of this beautiful gloss! It gives such a plush feeling to your lips and I love the subtle color it leaves! I can’t recommend this enough as a lippie lover!!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I extremely like this super hydrating lip gloss. It is a completely comfortable wearing and not stick at all. I applied it over other lipstick color and I love the glitzy shinning effect so much. Recommended for whoever love juicy looks lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loveeee itttt! It does everything it says it does. The prettiest color. Definitely glossy glass lips. The shine did start fading the tiniest bit after an hour or two. My lips wereee left hydrated though. Did not tingle just like promised. Thank you for reading!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh I absolutely love this lipgloss it’s such a pretty purpley pink and makes my lips feel so nice. If you are into very cushioned lipglosses you will love these they also have a huge applicator making it easy to use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i just love everything huda beauty and this lipgloss is just perfect. it’s so glossy and the slight pink shade is stunning. i already own a clear lip gloss and they are great. perfect for everyday wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shade! I used it over my lipstick and it gave the perfect shine! Definitely going to be a new staple

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes
reviews.review_text: This gloss is unreal! It makes my lips look so plump and juicy without any weird stickiness. The shine is perfect, and the color payoff is gorgeous. Feels like a gloss and a lip treatment in one—obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love all things Huda Beauty and this gloss is hands down one of my favorites. Gives my lips such a nice shine and the new ube shade pairs so pretty with neutral lip liners. My favorite is to wear it over a brown lip liner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This lip gloss is amazing. Love the shade is so beautiful will also look great with any lip liner . I love it the shade is super beautiful. You girls need it you will not be disappointed. Is perfect for every day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best gloss ever if you’re looking for a new gloss this is such a good one. I love who the beauty they do the best. I am always surprised and impressed. It lasts so long and the color is super pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If I could give it zero stars I would. SO sticky. Can’t believe some of the reviews saying it’s not sticky. Tried to give it to my daughter and she wouldn’t even take it. Do not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m obsessed with this ube lip gloss so far! The color, texture, consistancy, everything is perfect! I love that it isn’t very sticky and it seems to last for a while. Definitely a new staple in my routine!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this lip gloss I don’t change it for anything, if the texture is super nice and the color is spectacular with glitter flashes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The colour is gorgeous however the after taste is gross it reminds me of eating dandruff and it just is gross compared to my other highend glosses I don’t get a gross after taste. Another thing the prices used to be 26$ now there 29 they are scamming us as consumers wake up

reviews.review_text: I love using this in my everyday makeup routine. No matter what I blend it with, it works!

reviews.review_text: Love love love the color , but I need to reaply it a lot , because my lips seems to absorb the gloss very very fast !

reviews.review_text: Stays on pretty well super glossy and moisturizing beautiful colour only issue is my sister STOLE IT FROM ME and I had to get another

reviews.review_text: I used this for 3 weeks everyday and i finished it immediately. This product is a must buy. It made my lips super pretty and some lip glosses make lips ricky but this one did not. Huda beauty is a must have🙌🏽

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love the colour of it, formula is not sticky at all, am satisfied with my purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am usually not a lipgloss girl, but this is my go to when I want a little something special. Not sticky or gooey. When it wears down it does leave a nice shine which I like. I would say this is much more long lasting than other glosses I have tried.

reviews.review_title: Must have in you makeup bag
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this lip gloss! It doesn’t just hydrate your lips it actually lasts and looks amazing. The only thing I say is it runs out quick but besides that it’s really good
